review.title: Pseudo Fuzzy Set
review.abstract: Here a novel idea to handle imprecise or vague set viz. Pseudo fuzzy set has been proposed. Pseudo fuzzy set is a triplet of element and its two membership functions. Both the membership functions may or may not be dependent. The hypothesis is that every positive sense has some negative sense. So, one membership function has been considered as positive and another as negative. Considering this concept, here the development of Pseudo fuzzy set and its property along with Pseudo fuzzy numbers has been discussed.

metadata.title: Pseudo Fuzzy Set

sections.text: Once we have defined these uncertainties only by using probability approaches in the various areas of the system, it can be very difficult to obtain a large number of experimental or observed data. In this context, a great philosopher (Zadeh, 1965) has widely used the concept of blur, which can help manage uncertainty and reduce the difficulty of the availability of large amounts of data. (Chakraverty S. and Nayak S., 2013; Dubois D., 1980; Hanss Michael, 2005; Klir, 1997; Nayak S. and Chakraverty S., 2013; Zimmermann HJ, 1991) Recently, we (Nayak S. and Chakraverty S., 2013) have developed a transformation method and modified fuzzy numbers into various problems and the uncertain solution has been investigated.
